Body:
"""
        Test that a batch is processed correctly.
        """
e = engine.KmipEngine()
e._logger = mock.MagicMock()
payload = payloads.DiscoverVersionsRequestPayload()
batch = list([messages.RequestBatchItem(operation=contents.Operation(enums.
    Operation.DISCOVER_VERSIONS), request_payload=payload)])
results = e._process_batch(batch, enums.BatchErrorContinuationOption.STOP, True
    )
self.assertIsNotNone(results)
self.assertEqual(1, len(results))
